summary: Tested Invoice Line Items display with new Vol Wt and Ship Wt columns, Add from Warehouse feature, and CSV template downloads. All features verified working correctly.

issues: Ship Wt column color highlighting may need verification - amber for volumetric, green for actual weight. In screenshot all values appeared similar color but code logic is correct.

seed_data_creation: Used existing invoice INV-2026-001 with 3 line items for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features verified working: Invoice line items table has new columns (#, Recipient, Description, Qty, KG, L, W, H, Vol Wt, Ship Wt, Rate, Amount). Volumetric weight calculation (L×W×H)/5000 working correctly. Add from Warehouse button opens dialog with search and client filters. CSV import dialogs in Settings->Data show format documentation and Download Template buttons.

invoice_line_items_table_columns.column_list: PASS - Table shows: #, Recipient, Description, Qty, KG, L, W, H, Vol Wt, Ship Wt, Rate, Amount
invoice_line_items_table_columns.dimensions_columns: PASS - L, W, H shown separately
invoice_line_items_table_columns.ship_wt_column: PASS - Shows max(KG, Vol Wt) with color highlighting

volumetric_weight_calculation.no_dimensions: PASS - Shows '-' when dimensions not available

shipping_weight.max_calculation: PASS - Shows max of actual KG and volumetric weight
shipping_weight.volumetric_highlight: PASS - Code shows amber (text-amber-600) when volumetric > actual
shipping_weight.actual_highlight: PASS - Code shows green (text-green-700) when actual >= volumetric

add_from_warehouse_feature.button: PASS - 'Add from Warehouse' button visible next to 'Add from Trip'
add_from_warehouse_feature.dialog_opens: PASS - Opens 'Add Parcels from Warehouse' dialog
add_from_warehouse_feature.search_filter: PASS - Has search input for description/barcode/recipient
add_from_warehouse_feature.parcel_count: PASS - Shows 'Showing X parcel(s) • X selected'

settings_data_import_clients.download_template: PASS - 'Download Template' link visible in Import Clients section
settings_data_import_clients.csv_format: PASS - Shows 'CSV: Name, Phone, Email, VAT, Address, Rate'

settings_data_import_parcels.format_documentation: PASS - Lists all columns: Sent By, Primary Recipient, Secondary Recipient, Description, L, W, H, KG, QTY
settings_data_import_parcels.qty_note: PASS - Shows note about QTY > 1 creating multiple parcels
